Move
Dual Convocation
Indictment Brand
Ambernail
Crucify
Fury of the Ancients
Calcified Condemnation
Glassworks
FERVENT SERMON
PECULIAR TASTES
DUBIOUS LOYALTIES
AMBER WARD
Chevalier's Seal
Hammer of the First Crusade
Blade of the Second Crusade
Chapter of Doomed Men
Article of Amberblight
Bulwark of the Third Crusade
Passage of Living Flame
We're as doomed as my regiment!
The amber! I am losing control!
This place will become our tomb!
This armor isn't enough to withstand their furor!
Their strength is too much!
We are just another doomed crusade!
I must retreat as I did before.
What are you waiting for? We must depart!
This way, follow my lead!
Defying orders is what has kept me alive!
Seeing as you're not the captain of my regiment...
The only directives I follow are that which keep me alive.
This place is not meant for the likes of us!
How much longer can we withstand these fiends?
We are exposed here! Why did we choose this spot?!
I cannot handle any more!
The amber cannot save me!
It's too much! My armor is denting!
My hands will not stop shaking!
These foes are too deft for me!
How can it move so swiftly?!
You must strike them or we are doomed!
We will never succeed at this rate!
We were not prepared, and are facing the repercussions!
Do not fall! I cannot survive alone!
We cannot stop them!
They're tearing us to pieces!
It's only a matter of time before we are slain!
This fortune will not hold out forever.
Not all of us can move so well!
These orders are too much for me...
My equipment... too heavy!
I want to live! Do not make me!
No! They will hear us!
Hush, lest they hunt us down.
I will not be the cause of an ambush.
I see your gaze, tainted with envy for my amber.
You are all jealous of the power I wield...
My regiment could not surpass me and neither shall you!
Rid yourself of my proximity. I know what it is you seek.
Light and darkness be all that I need trust.
My power allows me to sense your ill intentions.
Regiment, change formation...
Adjusting... 'vantage' point.
Reinforcing the back ranks.
Foolish orders killed my regiment.
I'll not fall for your ploy to steal my amber.
And who appointed you as my leader?
I'll not submit to untrustworthy orders.
I place my faith in The Light, not you.
I've survived by my own instincts!
More... need to eat more...
Look away from me. I'll not tolerate your scheming gaze.
Keep your thieving hands away from me and my things.
Retreat? So that we may scamper into your trap?
A true leader would not give such an order.
I know you seek to deny me what is mine.
I knew one of you shared our battle strategies with them!
Which of you betrayers lead them to me?!
No.. how could they have known my tactics?
They knew, they knew my strike before it had begun!
One of you sold them our combat doctrines!
I could feel one of you hold me back, do not lie to me!
All of us have been deceived!
You held back, I know you did!
You would miss now of all times?!
Someone taught them our movements!
Our combat techniques were shown to our foes!
Liar! I know that injury is little more than a scratch!
Begone from me, traitor!
I'll not see myself deceived by the likes of you!
By the force of the light, I'll not be your fool!
That almost seemed rehearsed...
How very fortunate that you would be spared injury for some reason.
Of course you of all people would be spared.
And why would I expose myself like that?
And abandon such an advantageous position?
This position is fortified!
Tainted! Cease your attempts to poison me!
A waste our precious supplies.
I know where that's been! Begone from me!
Be away from me! I'll see to my own recovery.
The Light and the Amber are all that may restore me.
I'll not owe favors to the likes of you.
My trust is not so easily earned.
And I am expected to take you at your word?
I am perfectly sufficient without your tampering.
I'm content to think and act for myself.
I shall decide for myself if that is a good idea.
Your requests reek of treachery.
You'll not lead me into ruin so easily.
Cast not even a glance at me, miscreant.
You'll leave your hands where they be.
I know a tainted meal when I smell it!
This food looks great. Exactly what you'd want me to think...
I'll not eat food that I've not prepared myself.
A chevalier's power is forged in fire!
The amber hardens and fractures within me... Wonderful.
Their blows cause my corrupted blood to pump!
The suffering of my tainted body is divine!
I invite the amber's violation of my blood!
Bring divine penance for my many sins!
The scars of battle are their own prize!
A life must be punctuated with struggle!
I lead this campaign myself!
True heroines cast caution to the wind!
Reprimand me at your leisure.
Recklessness is righteousness!
I've many more scars to earn this day.
I feel my flesh writhing in the amber. It is delightful.
Penance awaits me in the cruelty of combat.
Come! Test my valor!
Rend me so that I may return it in kind!
Deliver unto me your fury!
I flagellate in the Light's name!
Bloodletting is good for the soul.
With injury comes glory!
No! The bloodletting has just begun!
I'll not squander this opportunity!
You'll not sway me from my path to penance!
Every drop of blood is a step forward!
Once more! It ignites the amber within me!
You'll need to hit harder!
Your hesitation insults me.
You dissatisfy me.
I shan't need to wait in this way.
Such punishment is squandered on you.
I must remind myself that envy is a sin.
The powers that be, do misdirect their wrath.
I am steadfast. My body will endure.
Spoils of war are for those who made sacrifices.
I'll prove my devotion through blood!
I need not your mercies and sympathies.
Do not tamper with my efforts.
Pass it along.
You insult me with your compassion.
Why must you insist upon dulling the pain?
Be away from me. I've much to yet endure this day!
The suffering I face is ample power!
I'll not depend upon your comforts.
Be away from me!
I'll face the coming hardships without bracing.
To dull the suffering is to dull the penance.
I'll not answer to your requests.
My discomfort is my comfort.
I'll not need your "help".
The sting of my injuries is perfectly sufficient.
Fasting is vital to piety.
I resist the ravenous call of the amber.
The pain of starvation... divine...
Somehow you're all more worthless than my regiment.
T'is not the first time I've been paired with useless company.
More corpses for me to leave behind, all of you.
The sheer incompetence I'm expected to work with...
You all are only barely better than a dead regiment!
How is it that none of you show even a shred of promise?
I only take orders from capable leaders.
I'll not follow the word of the incapable.
What a failure of a leader.
We'll see if any of you last the coming day.
Do try not to impede me on your way into the grave.
I can hardly believe that any of you are permitted to handle amber.
Magnificent. One of my compatriots is able to hit their target.
If you're to strike your target so easily, perhaps you could do so with strength.
If only you could hit often *and* effectively.
I've little faith that this is not in some way your fault.
A predictable performance.
Who decided to pair me with these buffoons?
Are your feet wrapped in lead?!
I didn't realize they sent pages into battle out here.
Predictable as always.
You dare ask ME to move for you?
I've important things to do here. Trouble someone else.
When I'm interested in yielding to you, I'll do so.
Meaningless whelp! Stand and fight!
Urchins like you have no place on the battlefield!
I'll not let the likes of you stand in my way!
Who on this earth convinced you to give me orders?
I'm my own woman, and I'll not stand for your blathering.
Arrogant snot.
I'll not trust an oaf to assist me.
Keep your clumsy hands to yourself.
Be away from me, knave.
Once we're done here, I lay claim to all the amber.
I expect triple rations when we're finished here.
Riches are for those who earn them.
I've laid claim to the earnings!
I'll wrest these riches away myself!
Clearly I'm earning a greater cut.
Glory and riches belong to the bold.
Only the valorant deserve payment!
I've worked too hard for you to blockade my path.
Shield me with your life. I want an extra portion.
You're rather appealing as fodder.
Spoils are for those who survive.
I've worked too hard for these table scraps.
If you insist upon wasting my time, I'll reciprocate.
Blindly following orders is for the destitute.
Fortune favors the bold!
Wealth comes to those who serve themselves.
I'm far more deserving than any of you!
Rather stingy with the rations, aren't you all?
I've amber to find. Do not waste my time.
I intend to be rewarded for my services, so make yourselves useful.
One of you buffoons get in front of me!
Where were any of you to shield me?!
Make yourselves useful, fodder!
Trying to claim all the glory for yourself, I see.
Stop encroaching upon my reward!
Don't try to claim credit for that kill!
All the more reason I deserve your portion.
How am I expected to share the pot with all of you?!
How much funding has been wasted on bringing you here?
I'll do as I please.
Do not attempt to decide what I should or should not do.
Give me a reason, and I'll consider it.
The amber... it was not enough.
There is no greater power to save me now...
I'm no better than my regiment now.
How can we hope to withstand this onslaught?
There's not enough amber in the world to save us.
Why did I prolong this all?
Onward to my glorious death.
If I fall, I'll at least fall with distinction.
I'll at least perish with nobility.
Carry on without me...
So useless...
Don't allow me to get in your way.
There's no chance now...
It's all pointless, isn't it?
There's nothing to be done about it...
What use are orders at this point?
There's no use in holding formation now.
It's all come apart.
Why press on? We've no chance of survival.
Why must we invite danger? We should turn tail.
There's no chance... no chance at all.
There's no need to draw this out.
Make it swift...
Enough of this.
It's no use.
Here, now finish this.
I cannot stand for this any longer.
We'll never make it to the end regardless.
We'd only die being stuck in the back.
We've nowhere to run at this point.
I've no right to accept that.
It would only be wasted on me.
Offer it to someone more deserving.
It would make little difference.
Cease. Conserve your energy.
Retain your strength for another.
I'm undeserving.
Offer your talents to someone else.
Save your breath.
I've not the strength for it...
So tired... I cannot focus...
I need rest...
Your efforts are wasted on me.
There is no purpose to it all.
We should all pack our things and flee.
My stomach turns...
I cannot keep it down!
My body rejects it...
The Light! THE LIGHT!
Flowing! Its essence flows through the valley!
The regiment is dead! Feast! I must feast!
The amber courses, and I see its glow!
The dark ones speak and I converse!
Infinite blackness blotted out by pools of light, a wave of fire!
I see it all before me, and I hunger!
Glisten, they glisten with the amber!
Onward into the shining abyss!
The all-consuming Light rejects us!
A throne of comfort to bask in the shadow!
I hear my regiment calling me!
Fracturing crystals turn to slime!
Only if I may stop for a meal!
It beckons both up and down!
A spirit free of moral trappings!
You need not even ask!
I see the path, it is so very clouded!
When do we next dine upon meat? I have not eaten in years.
Must we press on? Of course we must! Why should we?
The shadow of the Light will loom over us.
Is this armor real? Help me determine the answer!
I invite your offense!
No more respite for me, I'm famished!
Watch the amber flow from my ichor!
A blood sacrifice for the Light demons!
I pay tribute to the benevolent darkness!
Where are you trying to go? The Reliquary is this way!
Do not flee! You have my meal with you!
There is so much more to do tonight!
This feels so peculiar, like a tap upon my forehead!
A familiar sensation!
No need to be so crass!
That was rather close, please do be careful!
That is wholly unnecessary, I am doing fine as I am!
I am over here, not there!
Quite the senseless clobbering.
Must we resort to brutality?
Does it contain more amber?
If you intended to hit, you did not.
What a strange sight, when you miss them.
I've not seen anyone move so deftly before!
Does that not cause discomfort?
A few hits never killed anyone!
Does your blood remain in your body?
Why must you tease them so cruelly?
What devilishness!
Such a strange performance you put on!
I am planted as a mighty oak!
I'm immovable! Indomitable!
I'll stand firm against the chaos!
I cannot eat that!
That does not seem tasty...
I can't pay for that!
Are you trying to tickle me? Take a step back.
I'll not be needing that, I've eaten plenty of apples.
The overwhelming glow of darkness is all the mending I need!
There is no need to be so thorough!
You'll not benefit from that.
I'm certain you have other things to be doing.
Would you like to see an astounding trick?
You have a shadow on your shoulder!
Pain builds tolerance!
The darkness suggests I do not!
I'll have you know that the Light is speaking to me right now.
I've urgent matters to attend at this time!
Leave me be! I'm trying to light this candle.
I'm occupied right now. My armor needs polish.
I do not care for your nagging.
I do not care for sour foods.
This meat smells strange, does it not?
Too salty. You eat it.
My communes give me strength.
I've not come this far by harboring a weak spirit.
I've no intention of yielding to this rabble.
I am without compare!
My soul cannot be extinguished!
A chevalier would sooner perish than surrender!
We will survive this. I'll see to it myself.
Fear betrays you. Embrace the fire within!
Darkness and divinity guide us alike!
Steel yourselves. We will overcome.
Shed your fear so that our foes my find it instead.
"Defeat" is a term best reserved for our enemies.
Flawed is the enemy defense. I'll prove it.
Observe me, and follow my lead.
Their defenses shall fall at my hand!
There! The fault in its defenses!
Strike true as I know you will.
Our dominance is assured at your hand.
The amber subsumes weakness and returns strength.
I've not come this far by faltering when called upon.
No being can hope to impede one who channels the greater powers!
My strength is your strength.
In unity, there is power.
Feel my conviction and let it flow through you.
This body will not break today.
I channel the power of the amber within me!
I've no intention of dying with how much needs to be done.
I am unbreakable!
Through greater powers, my flesh is mended!
A breath of relief.
You've proven yourself an invaluable ally.
Had you been in my regiment, they might still be standing.
This is a a trifling injury, but warrants tending to.
You'll live to see the end of this day, I assure you.
March as one, and there's little that can be done to stop us.
I'd set high expectations for you, and yet you've surpassed them.
They will be left in ruin!
I've not even begun to reveal my wrath!
The power of the amber dwells within me!
The eternal abyss...
The all-consuming Light...
I've too much yet to do...
The Thing will be overcome... Even if I must perish.
The voices of the old gods are softer than you'd think.
We'll not succumb this day. They've ensured it.
It's not a flavor which can be described.
I'll not be sharing, though that may be for the best.
The Light's power yet persists.
Divinity mustn't be forsaken.
I'll maintain vigilance, of that you are assured.
The shadows shall be an inapt hiding place for these fiends in my presence.
"Transformed. Transcended."
Page
Écuyère
Errante
Chevalier
"Chevalier De Sang"
Blessed Full Plate
Intronisé
Prédicatrice
Clerc
Commandeur
"Grand-Croix"
Amber-Corrupted Staff

Direct exposure to amber can have horrifying effects on the human body, save for those attuned to the powers from beyond. The few who are able to endure the onslaught of amber's effects will discover strengths and properties unlike any other.

Formidable plate armor is but a footnote compared to the scepter wielded by the Judicator. Channeling the powers of forces beyond through her amber, she can manipulate the battlefield like no other. With the combat knowledge and physique of a long-time soldier, the Judicator is prepared to unleash her true potential upon her foes.
Finding balance between dichotomotic powers is no small feat, yet the Judicator heralds them in full, acting as both a mediator and an avatar of their respective wills.
